interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2020/08/23
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul Gibson', 'Lol Fletcher'], 'Producers': ['Peter Bullock'], 'Starring': ['Mark Williams', 'Sorcha Cusack', 'Jack Deam'], 'Studio': ['BritBox']}
Review Text: I really cannot express how much I adore this show .  The main characters are just so charming ... I love that Ron Weasley's dad is a priest tracking down criminals.  I also love that if you are watching closely - you can usually figure out a few of the clues. The final episode with all thee former detectives was epic.  I loved it. .. a departure from the classic Flabeau finale.  I have watched and rewatched all episodes in all 8 seasons .. and I can't wait for more.  For what its worth - I'm a millennial in the US, and my friends and I find this show hilarious and wonderful.
Review Title: Another spectacular season!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Sidekicks: A Dreamer and a Champion VHS Jonathan Brandis, Joe Piscopo, Chuck Norris, Mako, Beau Bridges (Actor) Rated: PG Format: VHS Tape Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Run time': '1 hour and 40 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 9, 2000', 'Date First Available': 'February 24, 2006', 'Actors': 'Jonathan Brandis, Joe Piscopo, Chuck Norris, Mako, Beau Bridges'} OK - so you have an ADHD kid who zones out into day dreams about Chuck Norris!

What could be better?

As hilarious as I remembered it to be.

The real question is why hasn't this cult classic come out on DVD? Phenomenal.... I mean - come on?! {'Content advisory': ['Foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Theodore Melfi'], 'Producers': ['Donna Gigliotti', 'Peter Chernin', 'Jenno Topping', 'Pharrell Williams', 'Theodore Melfi'], 'Starring': ['Taraji P. Henson', 'Janelle Monae', 'Kevin Costner']} This movie rocks.... from start to finish!!
Girl Power at its best.
... and who knew how gorgeous Janelle Monae is and how she holds the screen. Girl Power at its best.. {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Kelly'], 'Starring': ['Caitríona Balfe', 'Sam Heughan', 'Gary Lewis'], 'Studio': ['starz_svod']} Extremely (and I mean extremely) VIOLENT.

Such an interesting story. Why ruin it with such horror?

I just dont need those images in my brain. Extremely (and I mean extremely) VIOLENT. Such an interesting ... {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español', 'Português', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español', 'Français', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Mark Schwahn'], 'Starring': ['Alexandra Park', 'Tom Austen', 'Elizabeth Hurley'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} Tv rubbish at its best!! & with an amazing sound track. Liz Hurley kills it and excellent casting all the way - including the Aussie actress who plays the princess. Her accent from down under peaks through from time to time - but she's so fun to watch.
Warning - addictive and binge worthy. Tv rubbish at its best!! & with an amazing sound track {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Mark Schwahn'], 'Producers': ['Mark Schwahn', 'Brian Robbins', 'Joe Davola', 'Shuana Phelan'], 'Starring': ['Alexandra Park', 'Vincent Regan', 'Merritt Patterson']} The most entertaining, hilarious, eye-candy that will pull you in from the first moment. Hurley delivers an unexpected twist on the notion of the queen. Excellent casting all around. Excellent casting all around {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Steven Conrad'], 'Producers': ['Glenn Ficarra', 'John Requa', 'Jennifer Scher', 'Charles Gogolak', 'Christina Fitzgerald', 'Bruce Terris', 'Michael Nelson', 'Peter Moxley', 'James Parriott', 'Gil Bellows', 'Stephen Hoey'], 'Starring': ['Chris Conrad', 'Kurtwood Smith', 'Michael Dorman'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} How is it that I just heard about this show? Its everything I want.
Its beautiful music, directing, and acting. All of the actors are perfection.
Its hard to describe - but its a Must watch. As someone who votes - I'm surprised it hasn't gotten more awards.
It doesn't have to rely on anything grotesque or sexually subversive to achieve its humor.
Dark comedy at its best. Spectacular in Every Way! {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Andy De Emmony', 'Sarah Harding', 'Jamie Payne'], 'Producers': ['Jake Lushington', 'Trevor Hopkins', 'Matthew Patnick', 'Greg Phillips', 'Geoff Webb', 'Christine Healy', 'Simon Heath']} Absolutely brilliant! I love these women working together with their respective super powers. Its beautifully done and really a joy to watch. Its lovely to see strong female leads is such a compelling story. Season 1 is a bit scary - so be warned. That being said. -the acting, cinematography, and costume design are perfection. Enjoy! Outstanding - We need more of this show! {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Frazee', 'Gary Harvey'], 'Starring': ['Julie Graham', 'Peter Benson', 'Rachael Stirling']} I've watched all the seasons . While I do prefer the show when in London (seasons 1,2) - this season was also spectacular. I loved it. Fabulous all around. spectacular show {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul Gibson'], 'Starring': ['Mark Williams', 'Sorcha Cusack', 'Jack Deam'], 'Studio': ['BritBox']} Another spectacular season. Of course, I missed Lady Felicia .. but Bunty is just such a great addition. I love her character. Many great episodes this season complete with strawberry scones- including a Flambeau finale. As an American - I just can't get enough of this show! I've seem most episodes at least twice. I wish they had French subtitles so I could try and improve my language skills and watch it a third time. Can't wait for season 8. the truth will out :) {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Caffrey'], 'Producers': ['Camilla Campbell', 'Rebecca Eaton', 'Chris Lahr', 'Rhonda Smith', 'Robert Wulff-Cochrane']} Really? Do we actually need yet another P.O.S. show out there filled with violence and darkness. Actors are good- but I just don't need to put depressing images into my brain. When will people realize that (most) Television really is so depressing. Why create this content? Why watch it? After 1 episode , I am out. Just another dark, violent show meant to instill fear Bruce Almighty Comedy, Fantasy, Inspiring, Outrageous ['A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.'] {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tom Shadyac'], 'Producers': ['Tom Shadyac', 'Jim Carrey', 'James D. Brubaker', 'Michael Bostick', 'Steve Koren', "Mark O'keefe"], 'Starring': ['Jim Carrey', 'Jennifer Aniston', 'Morgan Freeman']} Fun, delightful... a good laugh. Enjoy. Jim Carrey at his best. {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Shaun Evans', 'Kate Saxon', 'Colm McCarthy', 'Geoffrey Sax', 'Andy Wilson', 'Edward Bazalgette', 'Tom Vaughan', 'Craig Viveiros', 'Giuseppe Capotondi', 'Kristoffer Nyholm'], 'Starring': ['Roger Allam', 'James Bradshaw']} I love British crime dramas and period pieces. Therefore - this show is essentially the perfect combination. Shaun Evans is just so fascinating to watch - even in the season when he has a monstrous mustache. The characters, Fred Thursday and DI Strange are just so relatable and lovable. I just want to keep watching them.
The episodes always start of with a set of seeming random images.. and how they come together is just the right amount surprising. I can't wait to watch more. When will Amazon get season 7? And when will season 8 be released? For what its worth - I really liked the episode directed by the main actor himself... and can't wait for more of Ms. Thursday. Beautiful attention to detail with respect to costumes, set design and all things related to the era.... I would say on the level of "Once Upon A Time in Hollywood". Brilliant acting all around, and the bucolic setting of Oxford makes me long for a visit to the UK. An Oxford Masterpiece {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul Gibson', 'Lol Fletcher'], 'Producers': ['Peter Bullock'], 'Starring': ['Mark Williams', 'Sorcha Cusack', 'Jack Deam'], 'Studio': ['BritBox']} I really cannot express how much I adore this show . The main characters are just so charming ... I love that Ron Weasley's dad is a priest tracking down criminals. I also love that if you are watching closely - you can usually figure out a few of the clues. The final episode with all thee former detectives was epic. I loved it. .. a departure from the classic Flabeau finale. I have watched and rewatched all episodes in all 8 seasons .. and I can't wait for more. For what its worth - I'm a millennial in the US, and my friends and I find this show hilarious and wonderful. Another spectacular season!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Media Enthusiast:** The user has a strong passion for movies and TV shows with cult status and unique storytelling, particularly enjoying contemporary works that resonate with powerful themes. They prefer uplifting narratives over dark, violent content and are sensitive to graphic elements that detract from narrative quality.

- **Nostalgia Driven:** Values content that evokes nostalgia from the late '90s and early 2000s, with a penchant for vintage formats like VHS. The user enjoys shows that feature strong female leads and compelling storytelling, including period pieces and British dramas.

- **Comedy and Empowerment Appreciation:** Favors humorous content, particularly dark comedies that blend humor with themes of empowerment. They appreciate wit that avoids grotesque or excessively dark elements.

- **Family Considerations:** Prioritizes family-friendly content suitable for younger audiences, viewing media through a child's perspective.

- **Critical Engagement:** Values captivating storytelling, strong casting, and engaging soundtracks. Recent interactions highlight an enjoyment of character-driven narratives, especially those set in historical contexts, and a keen eye for details that enhance production quality.

- **Frustration with Discontinuation:** Concerned about access to older media formats and seeks easier ways to acquire nostalgic classics while expressing a desire for upcoming releases and additional language options for an enriched viewing experience.

The user consistently favors high-quality, nostalgic, family-oriented, and comedic content with memorable characters and socially significant themes, demonstrating a discerning taste for depth and relatability in storytelling.
